title: 1: Joe's Bet on America
itunes:title: Joe's Bet on America
description: Following the 9/11 anniversary, Joe looks forward to the next 20 years and why what you have been told about America's standing in the world might be wrong. Mika recalls the most harrowing moments of her reporting career.
itunes:author: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
dc:creator: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
